title: A New Dawn
description: Isolated and alone, or is she?Far from her homeland of Egypt, Nefe must adapt to Canaan and learn to live the rest of her life in Damaski.Can she accept Panna as her sister? Can she befriend Paebel and learn Akkadian? Will Niwa accept her into the estate built in Paaten's absence?Find out in A New Dawn, a story of love, trust, and healing.This novella is the bonus ending to King's Daughter and a part of the complement collection that supplements Lauren's debut series, The Lost Pharaoh Chronicles, a resurrection of an erased time that follows the five kings of Egypt who were lost to history for over three millennia. The series begins with book one, Salvation in the Sun.
author: Lauren Lee Merewether
